about.title: About Us
about.content:
## Our Mission

We provide reliable, blockchain-verified public health information to everyone, everywhere.

## Our Team

We are a dedicated team of health professionals and technologists working together to combat misinformation.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.content:
## Privacy First

We value your privacy. We do not store personal conversations without your consent.

## Data Usage

Your data is used solely to improve our services and provide accurate health information.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.content:
## Terms of Use

By using this service, you agree to our terms. Information provided is for educational purposes only and not a substitute for professional medical advice.

contact.title: Contact Support
contact.content:
## Get in Touch

You can reach us at support@healthbot.com or via our WhatsApp channel.
